gurmukhi: ਚਰਨ ਕਮਲ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਰਸ ਲੁਭਿਤ ਹੁੲਿ ਮਨੁ ਮਧੁਕਰ ਸੁਖ ਸੰਪਟ ਸਮਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Charan Kamal Makarand Ras Loubhit Hui , Manu Madhoukar Soukh Sanpat Samaanay Hai ?
translation: The bumble bee-like mind of a Guru-oriented person acquires strange comfort and peace by meditating on the nectar-like dust of the feet of the True Guru.

gurmukhi: ਪਰਮ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਅਤਿ ਕੋਮਲ ਸੀਤਲਤਾ ਕੈ ਬਿਮਲ ਸਥਲ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਨ ਡੁਲਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Param Sougandh Ati Komal Seetalataa Kai , Bimal Sadal Nihachal N Dulaanay Hai ?
translation: Because of the influence of strange fragrance and very delicate calmness in the elixir-like Name of the Lord, he resides in the mystical tenth door in such a stable state that he does not wander any more.

gurmukhi: ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਅਤਿ ਅਗਮ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਨਹਦ ਰੁਨਝੁਨ ਧੁਨਿ ੳੁਰ ਗਾਨੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sahaj Samaadhi Ati Agam Agaadhi Liva , Anahad Rounajhoun Dhouni Ur Gaanay Hai ?
translation: In a state of equipoise and by virtue of inaccessible and immeasurable concentration, he keeps repeating the sweet rune of Naam continuously.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਪਰਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਪਰਮ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਦਾਨ ਅਾਨ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨੁ ਸਿਮਰਨ ਬਿਸਰਾਨੇ ਹੈ ||੨੭੧||
transliteration: Pooran Param Joti Param Nidhaan Daana , Aan Giaan Dhiaanu Simaran Bisaraanay Hai ?271?
translation: By acquiring the great treasure of the Lord's name who is light supreme and complete in all respects, he forgets all other forms of remembrances, contemplations and worldly awareness’s. (271)
